name: Lorentz Factor (Edwar)
description:
Objective: Collect as many points as you can by destroying the asteroids and collecting crystals. When the timer on each stage runs out, hop in the cargo ship to receive an upgrade to your ship.

Controls:

Keyboard: 'WASD' to direct the ship, 'K' to accelerate and confirm, 'J' to fire, 'Esc' to pause.

Gamepad: 'Left Stick' to direct the ship, 'A' to accelerate and confirm, 'X' to fire, 'Start' to pause.

Lorentz Factor is the first game I have ever developed. This game still is light on content, but the basic systems are already in place, and a full gameplay cycle is playable. I plan on adding more content in the future, so stay tuned!

Thank you for playing, and I hope you have fun!

 -- Eduardo Bastos
